fsal_status_t FSAL_lock ( fsal_handle_t *  objecthandle,
fsal_op_context_t *  p_context,
fsal_lockparam_t *  lock_info,
fsal_lockdesc_t *  lock_descriptor 
)

FSAL_lock: Lock an entry in the filesystem.

Parameters:
objecthandle (input): Handle of the object to be locked.
p_context (input): Authentication context for the operation (user, export...).
typelock (input): Type of lock to be taken
lock_descriptor (output): The returned lock descriptor
